Distributed Energy Resources.Description: Distributed Energy Resources often rely on renewable energy sources such as solar, wind, and hydro power for generation.
Energy storage systems play a crucial role in integrating and managing the intermittent nature of distributed energy resources.
Smart grid technologies enable the seamless integration and control of distributed energy resources within the existing power grid infrastructure.
Microgrids provide localized power distribution and can incorporate distributed energy resources to enhance energy resilience and reliability.
